robot_capabilities.RoboTug: Powerful robot that can pull or push heavy shelving units. Can work in coordination with other movers. It can team up with other robots.
robot_capabilities.TrayWagon: Mobile platform robot with lift and tray to carry large boxes and trays. Can transport materials between aisles. It can team up with other robots.
robot_capabilities.ScanBot: Equipped with barcode and RFID scanner. Updates inventory logs in real-time and identifies misplaced items. It can team up with other robots.
robot_capabilities.ShelfMate: Arm-equipped robot for organizing shelves, placing or removing small packages. Communicates with ScanBot for sorting. It can team up with other robots.
robot_capabilities.Sweepy: Compact cleaning robot with rotating brushes and dust collection system. Operates in cleared floor areas. It can team up with other robots.
robot_capabilities.VacLine: Heavy-duty vacuum robot for industrial floor cleaning. Covers wide area quickly. It can team up with other robots.

robot_morphology.RoboTug: Payload: ~50 kg, Speed: 0–1.5 m/s, Weight: 90 kg, Size: 1000 × 800 × 600 mm, Traction: Omni wheels
robot_morphology.TrayWagon: Payload: ~50 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 60 kg, Size: 900 × 600 × 400 mm, Lift Height: 200 mm
robot_morphology.ScanBot: Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 20 kg, Size: 500 × 400 × 300 mm, Scanner Range: 1.5 m, Connectivity: Wi-Fi + BLE
robot_morphology.ShelfMate: Payload: ~10 kg, Speed: 0–1.8 m/s, Weight: 25 kg, Size: 600 × 500 × 400 mm, Arm Reach: 500 mm
robot_morphology.Sweepy: Speed: 0–1.5 m/s, Weight: 15 kg, Size: 400 × 300 × 200 mm, Cleaning Width: 300 mm
